an1.596-599:1: "Bhikkhus, one thing, when developed and cultivated, leads (596) to realization of the fruit of stream-entry … (597) to realization of the fruit of once-returning … (598) to realization of the fruit of non-returning… (599) to realization of the fruit of arahantship. What is that one thing? It is mindfulness directed to the body. This is the one thing that, when developed and cultivated, leads to realization of the fruit of stream-entry … to realization of the fruit of once-returning … to realization of the fruit of non-returning … to realization of the fruit of arahantship."
